title: The Future of AI in Renewable Energy
abstract: Exploring the transformative potential of artificial intelligence in optimizing renewable energy production and grid management.

abstract: An accessible introduction to quantum computing concepts and their potential impact on various business sectors.

abstract: Overview of novel materials reducing the environmental footprint of the construction industry.
